title: unable to connect RADS error... played last night. no issues.. can connect on another computer...
body: whats going on here? i even tried to reinstall like the video on your site says... still the same issues... cant even see load up screen... whats the deal

replies.body: I have had the same problem since last week, just started randomly. I can get into game eventually but I drop out constantly even though my ping sits between 34-37. Already tried everything other than  a full reinstall. would be great if someone has a fix for this.
